name: Max and the Magic Hammer Alpha
name_original: Max and the Magic Hammer Alpha
description:
This is a VERY early alpha build of the game so we know certain things need major improvements.  PLEASE feel free to email us any feedback that you have to jason@wakeupcartoons.com

Story

Max and The Magic Hammer is a love letter to the early days of 3D Platformer games. You remember, unforgettable worlds, quirky characters, hidden secrets, bonus stages and mini-games.

Spread out across a vibrant port town and it’s many environments (and beyond), follow the wild adventure of Max as he fights, races, and smashes his way around in hopes of clearing the name of the Grassroots family and restoring justice from the evil Dr. Wellness with a hint of magic!

Controls

Move Forward - W

Move Backward - S

Jump - Spacebar

Smash - Left Mouse Click

Interact - E

Crouch - Caps Lock

Run - Left Shift

Pause - Espace

FOLLOW US ON TWITTER!
